generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by sidewalks and buildings.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and barriers.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including brick structures and commercial buildings.
- fence: A metal fence is present along the left side of the road, separating the parking area from the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic signs and streetlights.
- traffic sign: A blue traffic sign indicating "Keine Wende möglich für LKW" (No turning allowed for trucks) is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, particularly on the left side and further down the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along both sides of the road, including a white van and a silver sedan.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
